page.title: 10SOCIAL EVENTS
page.content: SOCIAL EVENTS The local community have an active Village Hall Committee who meet once monthly. Present annual events are, a bonfire night celebration held in the grounds of one of the larger houses, a Harvest Supper to coincide with the local Church celebration, a Whist Drive and SummerFayre. More frequently the Village Hall is used for billiards competitions. There are plans to form a Ladies Club also for billiards. It seems that all events are well supported both by the local population and also those from outlying areas. The major land owner provides the ground and facilities for regular cricket matches. The team are presently playing in the Shropshire League. The newer members to the village have formed a walking club which invites other residents to join.
